Type Method# buildPartialBlock(accumulated:next:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
static func buildPartialBlock<each Accumulated, R>(
    accumulated: ResolverSpecificationBuilder<Property>.Specification<Property, repeat each Accumulated>,
    next: R
) -> ResolverSpecificationBuilder<Property>.Specification<Property, repeat each Accumulated, R> where repeat each Accumulated : Resolver, R : Resolver
```

Available when `Property` conforms to `_IntentValue`.
